overview: Returning from a party dedicated to alcohol and cocaine, two parallel events intertwine. On one side Lucio and Simone, inexperienced screenwriters struggling with the drafting of a crazy horror subject. On the other, Frank and Camilla, young lovers whose evening will take a terrifying turn. They will highlight the stupidity and insecurity of the characters, ending up having bizarre mutual influences.
tagline: A party. A night. A script.
title: Gonzi
